name: N-Sub
summary:
N-Sub is one of the earliest naval video game titles.

The object of the game is to maneuver an on-screen submarine, the "N-Sub," with the joystick and sink the enemy fleet with torpedo fire in the Cobalt Blue Sea. Torpedoes can be fired vertically or horizontally by means of two separate 'FIRE' buttons and 3 torpedoes can be fired in rapid succession by keeping the button depressed. The enemy ships attack the N-Sub with missiles, torpedoes and depth charges. One round is over after the attack by the enemy fleet of twelve ships (No. 1 Fleet Black, No. 2 Fleet Blue) and the loop attack by the enemy destroyer. Enemy attack gains in ferocity with each new round. Bonus points are awarded if the fleet of twelve ships and the destroyer are destroyed. One extra N-Sub is added if players attain high score. The game is over when all of a player's N-Subs are sunk.

name: NSFW: Not a Simulator for Working
summary: NSFW or Not a Simulator For Working is casual simulator game where you try not to work anytime you can. Beware of your snitching co-worker and your boss, you will get FIRED !!!

name: NSYNC: Get to the Show
summary: With such notable worldwide popularity, it was only a matter of time before the boys of NSYNC got their own handheld video game. Join JC, Justin, Chris, Joey, and Lance in the most daring adventure the group has ever embarked upon, helping them get to the show before curtain time. Of course, life is never easy for these highly sought-after recording artists, so you'll have to help them with such challenges as making snacks and running errands in a stretch limousine. If you can accomplish these feats, you might even get to help the band warm up for their big show with a friendly game of hackey-sack! Packed with challenges and dangerous distractions, the game's real appeal is its goofball spirit and dedication to the band itself. Each of the group's members' distinct personality shines through, making this an awesome title for anyone who likes NSYNC. They might not be the most likely of video game heroes, but have you ever seen a more handsome bunch of characters?

name: NS-Tower
summary: Players must climb up a procedurally generated tower.

name: NS-Shaft
summary: Players must safely drop down a procedurally generated shaft.

name: NSFWare
summary:
WarioWare meets Pornhub.

This game is basically pornography, so you must be 18 or older to play...I guess?

name: nStations
summary: If you think this is just another simulation game about a post-apocalyptic event where people now need to colonize outer worlds... You're SOOOO wrong. This game is the first of this genre where you can start playing in any supported platform and keep playing on others and come back anytime you want. HD graphics and outstanding sound effects and simulation features playable anywhere.

name: NSYNC Hotline Phone and Fantasy CD-Rom Game
N Step Steve: Part 1
summary: A crew of kittens needs rescuing again. More puzzles stand in your way. This time, you only have N steps to solve them.

name: NSFW Studio
summary: NSFW Studio is a casual arcade idle clicker game where your job is not only about editing porn videos, but also fucking your freelancers at your work desk. Your side chicks might not like what you do, so keep an eye out and donâ€™t get caught!

name: NSMB: Mario vs. Luigi Online
summary:
A unity-standalone 2-10 player remake of the Mario vs. Luigi gamemode from the New Super Mario Bros DS download game.

Includes the 5 default levels (Grassland, Bricks, Castle, Pipes, and Ice), along with a handful of custom levels to battle on! All power-ups are included and remain faithful to their original counterparts, along with the new addition of the Propeller Suit & Ice Flower!

name: NSG
summary: NSG tells a story about Hugo, on his last year as a high school student, while he confronts the great dilemma of choosing a career. He dreams about making a movie and needs to decide between his dream and financial stability.

name: NSFW Solitaire
summary: Solitaire collection with XXX card sets. You can play it with one hand...

name: NS-Shaft
summary: NS-Shaft is an unlicensed port of the game of the same name included in the Terminator 1.8 handheld system.

name: NSG: Missing Tales
summary: In this new adventure, the group discovers that Tales has disappeared and it is up to them to find him and arrive in time for the Halloween party. Here, time is your biggest enemy, or perhaps an ally? Your choices will make you closer or further away from finding it.

name: N Step Steve: Part 2
summary: The massive conclusion to the N Step Steve saga.

name: NSMB2: Mushroom Madness
summary: New Super Mario Bros. 2: Mushroom Madness is a small modification of New Super Mario Bros. 2 for the Nintendo 3DS. It features 1 and a half worlds of brand-new mushroom-themed levels exploring some fresh environments and interesting mechanics that haven't been seen before.

name: NSMBW Superstar Mode
summary: NSMBW Superstar Mode is a mod that aims to make NSMBW more challenging while offering a creative and new feel to the game. This mod is in development and only a demo has been released so far.

name: NSMB Mario Vs Luigi: KKT's Gooffy little Mod
summary:
A Mod Of The Somewhat Popular Mario VS Luigi Online!

This Mod Aims To Be Serious & Silly, With A Little Somthin' For Casual, & Competitive Players. Hazards, Which Are Random Objects That Randomly Spawn In The Maps.This Mod Features New Maps, Unused VS Maps From The Original Game, & More Unique Maps! New Characters Like Toad, & New Powerups Like The Bubble Flower & Bombro, & Several "Joke" Powerups. And Some Features To Customise Matches Further.

A bunch of other smaller features to find out yourself :)
